===Overview===
The '''Communist Party of the Soviet Union'''('''CPSU''') (Russian; 
Коммунистическая партия Советского Союза) was the founding and ruling political party of the [[Soviet Union]]. The CPSU was the sole governing party of the Soviet Union until 1990 when the union collapsed into their democratic nation states.
